title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 406.14 - Deposit of securities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 406.14 - Deposit of securities

State Regulations
A licensee who in lieu of filing a corporate surety bond
elects to deposit securities pursuant to Banking Law, section 643(3), shall
execute with the depository bank, trust company or national bank a deposit
agreement in form satisfactory to the superintendent. An executed copy of this
deposit agreement shall be filed with the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
406.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
